org.teatrove.trove.file
Class TaggedTxFileBuffer

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.file.NonTxFileBuffer
      org.teatrove.trove.file.TaggedTxFileBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBuffer, TxFileBuffer
public class TaggedTxFileBuffer
extends NonTxFileBuffer
implements TxFileBuffer

A simple TxFileBuffer implementation that uses a tag bit to indicate if the file is in a clean state. As long as all commit operations finish, the file will be tagged clean. Rollback operations are not supported.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill

close

public void close(long timeout)
           throws IOException
Description copied from interface: TxFileBuffer
Waits for all transactions to commit or rollback before closing file. A timeout must be specified for the wait. If the value is -1, the timeout is infinite.

Specified by:
close in interface TxFileBuffer
Overrides:
close in class NonTxFileBuffer
Parameters:
timeout - maximum milliseconds to wait to close

IOException
